DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the absence of irritation potential (primary dermic irritability and cumulated dermic irritability) and allergy (sensibilization) of the product Dermacyd wipes.
DOC.brief_title: Topic Compatibility Dermacyd Wipes - Lactoserum - Hygiene
DOC.criteria: Phototypes: I, II, III and IV; Integral skin test in the region; Lactation or gestation Use of Antiinflammatory and/or immunesuppression drugs Personnel history of atopy; History of sensibilization or irritation for topic products; Active cutaneous disease; Use of new drugs and/or cosmetics during the study
